Desc.entry: Provides grants to local charity groups and organisations. Funds are for use in the provision of parks and open spaces, libraries and art galleries, advancement of education and the general benefit of the sick and poor. Majority of funds donated for capital projects rather than running costs.

ContactName.entry: Mr R H M Plews, Secretary to the Trustees

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: No personal callers, please contact in writing or by telephone
